name: Ice Cold Blood
description:
This is a game about war and revenge.

An invader army has arrived to your town, Dirty Ice. But what they didn't expect is that you were prepared for war. Brave warriors will take into their hands the protection of Dirty Ice, with a little help from the citizens. The story of the town and our heroes will unravel as the game progresses, with some surprises awaiting the player and choices to make that will affect the ending.
